name: Forever Shot
description:
Controls

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Spacebar to shoot

The goal is to prevent your allied ships from getting hurt; if they all get hit, then it's game over.

This was mainly just a test to see how fast I could create a basic game; it was also good practice on using particles in Godot.

Submitted to the Low Effort Jam 11

Music from https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles

Art made in krita, sound effects made in bfxr.
